Public Member Functions

 LightingColorFilter (uint32_t mul, uint32_t add)
 Create a colorfilter that multiplies the RGB channels by one color, and then adds a second color, pinning the result for each component to [0..255].
virtual ~LightingColorFilter ()

Private Member Functions

 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (LightingColorFilter)

Detailed Description

Subclass of ColorFilter for lighting colors. 

// Create a colorfilter that sets red color to zero
ColorFilter* filter = new LightingColorFilter(0xFF00FFFF, 0x00000000);
paint->setColorFilter(filter);
...

Definition at line 22 of file LightingColorFilter.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::graphics::LightingColorFilter::LightingColorFilter ( uint32_t  mul,
uint32_t  add 
)

Create a colorfilter that multiplies the RGB channels by one color, and then adds a second color, pinning the result for each component to [0..255].

The alpha components of the mul and add arguments are ignored.

virtual gaia::graphics::LightingColorFilter::~LightingColorFilter ( ) [virtual]
